TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ServiceAccount extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定服務的安全性內容，該內容會定義服務的登入類型。

span.span: Specifies a service's security context, which defines its logon type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用列舉當您初始化來指定您要安裝之服務的安全性內容。Use the enumeration when you initialize a to specify the security context of the service you are installing. 安全性內容會指出服務的系統和服務如何運作 （比方說，是否在服務電腦的認證或提供匿名認證給遠端伺服器） 的網路上具有的權限。The security context indicates the privileges a service has on the system and how the services act on the network (for example, whether the service presents the computer's credentials or anonymous credentials to remote servers). 列舉提供了各式各樣的權限，好讓您可以指定完全任何特定服務所需的權限。The enumeration provides a range of privileges so that you can specify exactly the privileges you need for any particular service. `LocalSystem`值定義為具有高度權限的帳戶，但大部分的服務不需要這類的提高權限層級。The `LocalSystem` value defines a highly privileged account, but most services do not require such an elevated privilege level. `LocalService`和`NetworkService`列舉成員提供較低的權限層級的安全性內容。The `LocalService` and `NetworkService` enumeration members provide a lower privilege level for the security context. > [!NOTE] > 值`LocalService`和`NetworkService`僅適用 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列。The values `LocalService` and `NetworkService` are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 family. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用安裝新的應用程式使用系統帳戶的安全性內容的列舉。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to install new programs by using the system account's security context. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount LocalService = int32(0)

summary.span: 做為本機電腦上未授權使用者並將匿名認證提供給任何遠端伺服器的帳戶。

span.span: An account that acts as a non-privileged user on the local computer, and presents anonymous credentials to any remote server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount LocalSystem = int32(2)

summary.span: 由服務控制管理員使用的帳戶，在本機電腦上具有延伸的權限，並可運作為網路上的電腦。

span.span: An account, used by the service control manager, that has extensive privileges on the local computer and acts as the computer on the network.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount NetworkService = int32(1)

summary.span: 提供延伸的本機權限的帳戶會將電腦的認證提供給任何遠端伺服器。

span.span: An account that provides extensive local privileges, and presents the computer's credentials to any remote server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount User = int32(3)

summary.span: 由網路上的特定使用者定義的帳戶。

span.span: An account defined by a specific user on the network.

summary.span: 除非您為 執行個體的 和 屬性設定數值，否則為 成員指定 會使得系統在安裝服務時提示要求有效的使用者名稱和密碼。

span.span: Specifying for the member causes the system to prompt for a valid user name and password when the service is installed, unless you set values for both the and properties of your instance.
